title: Popadyino
text:
Popadyino () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">village</a>) in Staroselskoye Rural Settlement, <a href="Vologodsky%20District">Vologodsky District</a>, <a href="Vologda%20Oblast">Vologda Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 48 as of 2002.
Geography.
Popadyino is located 71 km northwest of <a href="Vologda">Vologda</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Pogost Onochest is the nearest rural locality.
